definition: mountain pass/to close/to shut/to turn off/to concern/to involve

sentences.english: The Navy rolls through Guam with an entire carrier group, " Niemi continues."
sentences.chinese: “海軍控制着關島和整個航母艦隊，”涅米繼續說道。

sentences.english: Guam was ceded to the US in 1898 after the US-Spanish War.
sentences.chinese: 關島是在西班牙戰爭之後，1898年割讓給美國的。

sentences.english: The United States has also been upgrading forward deployed naval and air forces in Guam.
sentences.chinese: 同時，美國也一直在加強其在關島部署的海空軍力量。

sentences.english: The western Pacific island of Guam held Democratic Party caucuses on Saturday.
sentences.chinese: 西太平洋上的關島在星期六舉行了民主黨黨團大會。

sentences.english: It'sgot lots and lots of palm trees, blue waters, and white sand.
sentences.chinese: 關島有很多棕櫚樹，還有藍色的大海和白色的沙灘。

sentences.english: How was your vacation to Guam , Alice?
sentences.chinese: 艾莉斯，你的關島之旅怎麼樣？

definition: a hot tourist attraction/a tourist trap
(of an airplane etc) to fall to the ground and crash
aircraft carrier/CL:艘[sou1]/(coll.) (fig.) sth huge/(like) a whale
Fiji, country in the southwest Pacific Ocean
